Previous: iṣNext: iṣ2

√iṣ1 'seek, desire'

present: [6.] icháti  icháte etc. V.+   -- [1.] icháti  icháte etc. E.+   -- [6.] -iṣa  -iṣant E.+   -- [4.] -iṣyati E.+  

perfect: iyeṣa  īṣús  īṣe  īṣire etc. B.+  

aorist: [3.] aiṣiṣat   -- [5.] aiṣīt  aiṣiṣus etc.  

future: [1.] eṣiṣyati etc.  eṣiṣyate   -- [2.] eṣitā  eṣṭā  

verbal: iṣṭá V.+  éṣṭum B.+  éṣṭavaí  eṣitum  iṣitvā  iṣṭvā  -íṣya V.+  

secondary: passive: iṣyate etc. E.+  iṣyati   -- desiderative: eṣiṣiṣa-   -- causative: eṣayati etc.  eṣita  ichayāmi  

derivatives: -ichaka E.+  ichā E.+  ichu S.+  íṣ V.B.  -iṣa RV.  iṣí V.  iṣirá V.B.  iṣṭí V.B.  iṣmín RV.  éṣa V.+  eṣá RV.  eṣaka E.  eṣin AV.+  -eṣyà V.+  éṣaṇa V.+  éṣaṇā B.+  eṣaṇīya C.  eṣṭavyà B.+  eṣitavya C.  -eṣṭṛ E.  -eṣiṣiṣu C.  

Compare the roots 2iṣ and īṣ, eṣ. The present-stems eṣa, iṣa, iṣya only later, unusual, and with certain prepositions.
